divs: sighting details i remember waking up at about 10:30 pm and goingoutside and walking up the hill\street where i live and seeing 3 crafts. twowere triangular in shape and were smaller than the larger circular\rounded one.the lager round one was split in half yet still whole and spun in two differentdirections. the 2 other triangular ones were most likely doing the same thing. ithen remember turning around and seeing my friend walking up the street in asort of trance. i attempted to talk to him but he did not respond. then i cantremember anything for about 3 hours. at about 1 in the morning i awake in my bedand i feel the need to get out of my room but i cant. i feel like there arealiens or something in my room and their making it hard for me to move. then isimply fall asleep and waking up the next morning feeling ok but i stillremembered the crafts i saw the night before.
